definition: to fire (a weapon) in rapid succession
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: In the latter period, they were armed with Winchester rifles, clubs and knives.
sentences.chinese: 在后阶段，她们还配备了连发枪以及军棍和军刀。

sentences.english: A guy who's here for now can barely be bothered with a text.
sentences.chinese: “爱一时”的男人连发短信都嫌麻烦。

sentences.english: This would include texting rather than holding the phone to the ear.
sentences.chinese: 不仅仅是贴近耳朵接听，就连发短信也会受到伤害。

sentences.english: Rufus dreams of being a bear, and you want to shatter those dreams by saying he's just a dog?
sentences.chinese: 波涛连发梦也想做熊，你竟然忍心粉碎牠的梦想？

sentences.english: I frantically sent several emails to Rinpoche again, requesting him to help TM.
sentences.chinese: 我疯狂地连发多封电邮给仁波切，请求他帮助TM。

sentences.english: Finally, beating the strength to text.
sentences.chinese: 到最后，连发短信的力气都所剩无几。

definition: to reissue/(of a disease) to recur/(of a patient) to suffer a relapse
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
to bombard/to bomb/(fig.) to criticize/to roast
to bombard/to bomb/trad. also written 炮轟
to explode or burst/to quick fry or quick boil
to batter/combo (hit) (gaming)/(volleyball, table tennis etc) double hit/double contact
to cause to burn/to ignite/to detonate/a fuse
